Articles.Content:
Day and night cycles, how do they work in this game? Based on playtime? Because it has been night for a long while for me now.

Edit: Just noticed i have this in the wrong section, sorry for that.

You can activate time warp when your craft is landed to hurry the game along to daytime, I have to do this frequently so I can wear my sunglasses 8). Essentially it is based on play time, but restarting the flight will revert the time to the start of the flight, but ending the flight does not revert the game time.

Moved the topic.
